text: oh, i would assume we'd enjoy insects or smaller lizards. we could also pull each other's tails off and grill them, they'll just grow back. oh! my life-size cardboard mr. spock is here! i know he wouldn't care for an outburst of human emotion, but, oh goodie, oh goodie, oh goodie. commander spock requesting permission to be unfolded.
